name: Brian Bickerton
body:
### About
Web engineer at [OmniTI](http://omniti.com), building highly scalable web applications using a variety of tools and technologies. Currently doing a fair amount of work with Node.js, Postgres, Riak, and Redis.

### Presentations
* [_Riak in Production_](https://speakerdeck.com/tau_zero/riak-in-production-baltimore-riak-meetup) (July 18, 2013 Baltimore Riak Meetup)

### Articles
* [_Preserving Node.js Packages and Sanity_](http://omniti.com/seeds/preserving-nodejs-packages-and-sanity) (Feb 28, 2013, [OmniTI Seeds](http://omniti.com/seeds))
* [_Web Application Stat Collection with Node.js and Circonus_](http://circonus.com/blog/2013/01/Web-Application-Stat-Collection-with-Node.js-and-Circonus) (Jan 24, 2013, [Circonus Blog](http://circonus.com/blog))
* [_Histograms: Monitoring Hot Spots_](http://omniti.com/seeds/histograms-monitor-hot-spots) (July 11, 2012, [OmniTI Seeds](http://omniti.com/seeds))

### Around the Web
* [Twitter - @Tau_Zero](https://twitter.com/Tau_Zero)
* [Linkedin](http://www.linkedin.com/in/brianbickerton)
* [Github - @TauZero](https://github.com/TauZero)
* [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/brian.bickerton)
* [Google+](https://plus.google.com/u/0/104689420375915328911/about?rel=author)
* [StackExchange - @Tau_Zero](http://stackexchange.com/users/367347/tau-zero)
* [Last.fm - @Tau_Zero](http://www.last.fm/user/Tau_Zero)
* [Flickr - @bbickerton](http://www.flickr.com/photos/bbic)
